name: Activity Alerts + Security Actions
title: Activity Alerts + Security Actions
body:
This experimental feature is only available to a limited number of communities.

What this article covers: 

  • What are Activity Alerts?
  • What are Security Actions?
  • How to use Activity Alerts
  • How to enable Security Actions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What are Activity Alerts?

An Activity Alert is an alert that will appear as a banner (if you’re online) at the top of your Discord to warn you of any possible unusual/heightened activity that is happening in your server. If you’re offline, you’ll get a push notification. AutoMod will also send a message in your designated alert channel letting you know of the unusual activity. This allows admins and moderators to take quick action in dealing with any unusual activity.

What are Security Actions?

Security Actions can be used to secure your server in the event of an incident. This allows you to not only pause invites, but also pause DM’s between non-friends that are members within the server.

How to use Activity Alerts

In the event of unusual activity in your server, you'll see a banner appear at the top of your Discord app (both on desktop and mobile) if you’re currently online, notifying you of this unusual activity. If you’re offline, you’ll receive a push notification instead. AutoMod will also post a message in your designated alert channel letting you know of any unusual activity as well.

If this notification appears while you’re in the server in question, you can tap on Security Actions to pause Invites or DMs while you investigate.

If you’re currently viewing another server when the alert comes in, tapping on Review the Alert will bring you to the Members Page for that server.

If you notice unusual behavior, you can use Security Actions to pause Invites or DMs while you investigate.

How to enable Security Actions

If you received an alert about unusual activity in your server, you can utilize Security Actions to take any desired action on the unusual activity.

1. Open up the Discord App and navigate to the server you want to enable Security Actions on.

2. While in the server, tap on the server's drop-down menu, and then tap on Security Actions. You can also enable Security Actions from the Members tab or from the alert message in your alerts channel.

3. You can enable Pause Invites and Pause DMs as well as set how long you want these actions to last for. Tap on Save to save any changes after making your selection.

4. After your settings are saved, you'll see a banner appear at the top of your Discord server letting you know that invites and/or DMs have been paused and when these Security Actions will end.

5. If you want to end these Security Actions early, you can go back into the Security Actions settings and disable the Pause Invites and Pause DMs. Once you’re finished, tap on Save to remove the pause.

6. Finally, you’ll be able to mark the alert as Mark as Resolved once it’s been handled and leave a note for other moderators as to how.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What server permissions does a user need in order to be eligible to see Activity Alerts?

A: A user needs to have access to one of the following server settings: Administrator, Kick Members, Ban Members, Manage Messages OR Manage Server.

We also recommend that moderators have access to the alerts channel for Activity Alerts to see the in-channel alert messages.

Q: How do I change my Alerts notification settings?
A: You can control your server’s Alerts notification settings and your alert channel by going to Server Settings > Safety Setup > Raid Protection and CAPTCHA.

To control your personal notification settings, head to User Settings > Notifications > Community Activity Alerts.

Q; I’m getting alerts for large numbers of joins that are not raids. Is this normal?
A: Yes, Activity Alerts will notify you as to any abnormal numbers of joins or DMs, to ensure you’re aware of anything unusual going on. Utilize the Members tab to decide whether or not the activity requires follow-up actions.

name: [Known Issue] Mistaken Notification for Account Deletion
title: [Known Issue] Mistaken Notification for Account Deletion
body:
On August 25, 2023, we became aware of an issue where some European users mistakenly received SMS or email notifications that their accounts were going to be scheduled for deletion due to inactivity. 

These notifications were sent in error. These accounts are not at risk of being deleted if they have been active within the last two years, nor have any accounts been mistakenly deleted as a result of this issue. Impacted users have been notified of this error via email.

If there is any concern for your account, log into your Discord account here.

Q: Have any accounts been mistakenly deleted?

A: No accounts have been mistakenly deleted.

Q: Why did users receive this message?

A: This message was mistakenly sent through our notification system.

Q: What are you doing to clarify the issue for anyone who received this notification mistakenly?

A: We have emailed impacted users clarifying that their accounts will not be deleted.

If you have any questions or concerns, you can reach out to our Support team by submitting a ticket!

name: Google Play Points x Discord Nitro Offer
title: Google Play Points x Discord Nitro Offer
body:
Starting to roll out on August 31, 2023 and available through February 28, 2024 US Google Play Platinum members can claim 6 months of free Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 6 months of free Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover subscription time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing sub when activating the 6 months Nitro trial.

Requirements: Claim through Google Play on the Play Points Perks tab. The feature will start rolling out on August 31, 2023 to eligible users and ends on February 28, 2024. The offer must be redeemed in a Discord account by March 29, 2024 (23:59 pm local time).

Subscription: After the 6 months free trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Google Play Points?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Google Play account?  
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Google Play Points?

Google Play Points is a rewards program that lets you earn points and rewards with the Google Play Store.

With Google Play Points, you can:

  • Earn points for purchases of digital content, in-app items, and downloads from the Google Play Store.
  • Use points to get discount coupons, in-app items, or Google Play Credit.
  • Get more benefits, rewards, and points as your level goes up.

Content that you can buy and earn points on depends on your country.

You start to earn 1 point for every $1 USD you spend with Google Play. When you collect enough points within a calendar year, you’ll level up, which earns you more points and benefits. The higher your level, the more points you earn. Learn more about levels, benefits, and perks.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Google Play account?

1) Check your Google Play Points account 

Within the Play Points’ Perk tab, select from the offers and click “See details”

For any issues, ensure you are logged in and within your Profile it confirms your status as a “Play Points Platinum” member..

2) Claim through your mobile device

Tap on Claim to choose your Google Play Points Platinum Prize.

Choose the Nitro option to select as your prize.

Tap on Redeem to start the process to redeem the Nitro offer.

After accepting all of the Terms and Conditions, tap on Claim prize.

Congratulations! You’ve claimed the 6 month Nitro promotion and should see a confirmation with a code.

3) Claim through your browser

Tap on Claim to choose your Google Play Points Platinum Prize.

Choose the Nitro offer as your prize.

Tap on Redeem to start the process to redeem your prize.

After accepting all of the Terms and Conditions, tap on Claim prize.

Congratulations! You’ve claimed the 6 month Nitro promotion and should see a confirmation with a code.

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Through your Android Phone

1) Open up the Discord app and head to Profile.

2) Tap on Get Nitro and then Select Nitro Plan.

3) Tap on the credit card section.

4) Under the redemption section, enter the promo code.

Through Google Play

1) Open up the Google Play app.

2) At the top right, tap on the profile icon then head to Payments & Subscriptions.

3) Tap on Redeem Code.

4) Enter the promo code and redeem it.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 6 months Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:

- By choosing to activate this 6 months trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Google Play users can claim Discord Nitro promo which is starting to roll out on August 31, 2023 to eligible members and ending on February 29, 2024 (23:59 local time).

After February 28, 2024 , Google Play Platinum users will no longer be able to claim a trial.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by March 29, 2024  (23:59 local time).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by March 29, 2024 (23:59 local time)], it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 6 months of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from their Google Play email?

A: Rolling out to you soon if you’re a US Google Play Platinum member

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscriber? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 6 months Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:

- By choosing to activate this 6 month trials, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Q: I’m having trouble with my Google Play account.

A: Reach out to Google Play’s support team: https://support.google.com/googleplay/

name: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Synced Players - Promo FAQ
title: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Synced Players - Promo FAQ
body:
Starting from September 7, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), Synced players can claim 1 month of free Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of free Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover subscription time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing sub when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through Synced by September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST), and redeem in Discord account by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

Subscription: After the 1 month free trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers: 

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Synced?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from Synced?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • How do I share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Synced?

Synced is a sci-fi shooter that takes place in a techno-apocalyptic future, where you are a Runner who joins the war against corrupted human cyborgs called Nanos inside the sealed exclusion zone known as the Meridian. This futuristic sci-fi adventure developed by NExT Studios combines survival, crafting and base-building with a PvPvE experience with up to 50 players, and 1000 Nanos. 

Synced is available on PC platforms starting on September 8th, 2023!  

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Synced account?

You can claim this promotion on the web! 

1. To get started, create an account or log into your existing account in the Synced app on your PC.

2. Play Synced up until you have completed the tutorial and created a character in order to receive your Nitro offer.

3. Once the offer appears, select "Get It Now" or "Claim Nitro Offer" and follow the steps to receive your promotional Nitro link!

After these steps, please proceed into the following section on redeeming the Nitro trial on your Discord account.

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo link, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo link on your Discord account (or share this code with a friend). You must redeem this Nitro trial by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST) .

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is available in all regions except for the following: Mainland China, North Korea, Russia, India, Cuba, Crimea, Iran, Syria, Donetsk People’s Republic, Luhansk, and Belgium.

If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo link on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo link.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copy and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing the promotion link or right-click the promotion link and copy and paste the link into your browser window.

Note: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 

Note:
- If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:
- By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you press on and open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Synced players can claim Discord Nitro promo between September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

After October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), Synced players will no longer be able to claim a trial promo link.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion link last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from Synced?

A: Synced players will have to complete the tutorial and character creation to be able to claim the 1 month of Discord Nitro. 

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. Ineligible regions are: Mainland China, North Korea, Russia, India, Cuba, Crimea, Iran, Syria, Donetsk People’s Republic, Luhansk, and Belgium.

You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscriber? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:
- By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Payment Info and Subscription Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription plan, at the end of your free 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I didn't receive an email from Synced with the Nitro promo link, even if I'm Synced player?

A: In order to receive an email from Synced with the Nitro promo link, you must be a Synced player.

Additionally, make sure that you've opted to receive marketing emails from Synced. If you've unsubscribed, you sadly won't be able to see this offer. 

If you believe you are eligible for the promotion, contact Synced's support team by heading over to their official website and navigating to their Help Support page. 

Q: I see a Sad Trombone error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: Would you happen to be entering this Nitro promo link from the promotion into the Discord Gift Inventory or as a link within Discord chat?

If so, this is the incorrect method for redeeming the Nitro promo link, and you will see an error when attempting to redeem the promotion.

In order to successfully claim this promotion, try opening up an incognito browser and then copy and pasting the promotion link into your browser's address bar (also known as a location bar or URL bar). 

Alternatively, in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro subscription so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on. Or you can give the promotion link to a friend who hasn't had Nitro before.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk. However, this promo link can be gifted to a friend.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been redeemed" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been redeemed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo link has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've redeemed this promo link on another Discord account.

In particular, if you redeemed this promo link using your mobile device, double check the browser on your mobile device and see which Discord account you are currently logged into.

Unfortunately, once the promo link has been redeemed, the promo link cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the link is invalid. If you've copy and pasted this link, we recommend you double check the link you were given once more and make sure it exactly matches the link sent to your email.

If you received this link from a friend, double check with your friend on the exact link to make sure that it matches the link in their email.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if your friend has given an invalid link and we will not be able to provide a new link.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo link!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I’m having trouble with my Synced account.

A: If you are running into trouble with your Synced account, you can reach out to Synced support by heading over to their official website and navigating to their Help Support page.

name: Synced Gift Pack for Discord Nitro Users - Promo FAQ
title: Synced Gift Pack for Discord Nitro Users - Promo FAQ
body:
Starting from September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), Discord Nitro subscribers can redeem an exclusive in-game gift pack for the sci-fi shooter, Synced. 

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: Synced in-game gift pack for Discord Nitro subscribers

Included in the gift pack are the following items: 

1. Exclusive Weapon: Community Spirit

2. Exclusive Nano Skin: Dismay Crusher

3. Exclusive Runner skin: Mystic Medic

4. 5 Automat Coins

Who is Eligible: 

To claim through Discord, you must be a current Nitro subscriber or Nitro trial user. 

To redeem in Synced, you must have an active account in Synced. 

  • This promotion is available in all regions except for the following: Mainland China, North Korea, Russia, India, Cuba, Crimea, Iran, Syria, Donetsk People’s Republic, Luhansk, and Belgium. Synced players within eligible regions will have to complete the tutorial and create a character to view the exclusive items within their in-game backpack. 

Requirements:

Claim through Discord Gift Inventory from September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), and redeem in your Synced account by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

What this article covers: 

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Synced? 
  • How do I claim the Synced Promo in Discord? 
    • Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions 
  • How do I redeem the gift pack from Synced? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Synced Gift Pack
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
  • How do I share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Claiming and Redemption Process
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Synced?

Synced is a sci-fi shooter that takes place in a techno-apocalyptic future, where you are a Runner who joins the war against corrupted human cyborgs called Nanos inside the sealed exclusion zone known as the Meridian. This futuristic sci-fi adventure developed by NExT Studios combines survival, crafting and base-building with a PvPvE experience with up to 50 players, and 1000 Nanos. 

Synced is available on PC platforms starting on September 8th, 2023!  

How do I claim the Synced Promo in Discord?

As long as you're a Discord Nitro member, you'll be able to claim the Synced gift pack code in the Gift Inventory from September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord

In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active subscriber to Discord Nitro, (and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro subscriber).

  • If you are an active Discord Nitro subscriber, the code must be claimed in the Gift Inventory by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).
    • Otherwise, the code will not be available to claim after October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST). 

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscriber, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

Step By Step Claim Instructions 

1) Log into Your Discord account and head to the Gift Inventory tab. 

If you’re subscribed to Discord Nitro, start by logging into your Discord account. 

You may notice a notification bar at the top of your browser/desktop app, and you can press the "Take me there" button in the notification bar to be redirected to your Gift Inventory. 

You can also directly head to your User Settings, and then select the Gift Inventory tab.

2) Press the Claim button for the Synced Gift

Once you press Claim on the Synced Gift in the Gift Inventory and you'll then see a new pop-up with your 12 character code for this promotion.

If you want to redeem your code later, you can press the Maybe Later button, and then redeem the code before October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

How do I redeem the gift pack from Synced?

Once you have claimed the code in the Gift Inventory, you'll now need to officially redeem this code on your Synced account (or share this code with a friend).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Synced Gift Pack

All Synced players within eligible regions will be able to redeem this in-game gift pack. However, players will need to complete the tutorial and character creation to view the items within their in-game backpack! 

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

Note: Make sure you are logged into the correct Synced account before officially redeeming this gift pack. Once redeemed, the gift pack cannot be transferred to another account.

In order to redeem the gift pack on your Synced account, press on Redeem to get your unique redemption key. Then, proceed to the Synced website.

Once you're on the Synced website, you'll then need to follow these steps below:

1) Sign into your Synced account if you're not already signed-in, or create your Synced account.

You can sign up or log in here: https://www.syncedthegame.com/en/ 

2) Then, press “Redeem Code” at the top of the page. 

3) Enter the 10-character key from your gift pack in the "Code" section and then press "Send".

And that's it! Once you redeem your key, you will receive all of the items included in your gift pack. Happy adventuring!

Note: If you're running into any issues when attempting to redeem this promotion in the Synced website, reach out to the Synced support team by heading over to their official website and navigating to their Help Support page to review your account further.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to claim this code on your own Synced account, you'll be able to share this code with a friend to use instead.

To share the code, you can copy the 12-character code from the Gift Inventory (in your User Settings in the Discord app) and then share this code to a friend in a Direct Message.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Claiming and Redemption Process
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion for Nitro Subscribers run for?

A: This promotion runs from September 7th, 2023 (5pm PST) to October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

After October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), Nitro subscribers will no longer be able to claim a gift code.

Q: How long does my Synced gift code last for in my Gift Inventory?

A: Once a code is claimed in the Gift Inventory in Discord, all Synced gift codes must be redeemed by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Synced account by October 6th, 2023 (5pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to claim the gift pack.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion in the Discord Gift Inventory?

A: All current and new Nitro subscribers are eligible for this perk. 

This does not include Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boost-only members.

Q: Who can redeem this gift pack from Synced?

A: All Synced players within eligible regions will be able to redeem this in-game gift pack. However, players will need to complete the tutorial and character creation to view the items within their in-game backpack!

Q: Can I redeem the gift pack to my Synced account in my region? 

A: This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion.  Ineligible regions are: Mainland China, North Korea, Russia, India, Cuba, Crimea, Iran, Syria, Donetsk People’s Republic, Luhansk, and Belgium.

Claiming and Redemption Process

Q: On which Discord platforms can I claim this promotion?

A: You'll be able to redeem the promo on the mobile, browser and desktop version of the Discord app. 

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I don't see the Synced gift pack code in my Discord Gift Inventory? 

A: In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active subscriber to Discord Nitro and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro subscriber.

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscriber, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

If you are an active Discord Nitro subscriber, make sure to refresh your Discord client to double check if an update was needed.

  • What if I'm still running into issues? 
    • If the refresh does not work, please submit a ticket through our support system at: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.
    • Be sure to submit the ticket using the email address associated with your Discord account, and send us a screenshot of the following: 
      1. Your My Account tab
      2. Your Gift Inventory tab

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this promotion to my Synced account. How do I contact Synced support? 

A: If you are having issues redeeming this promotion on your Synced account, you can reach out to Synced support by heading over to their official website and navigating to their Help Support page.

name: Clips
title: Clips
body:
This experimental feature is only available to a limited number of users and servers.

Clips are only stored on your local machine. You control which Clips you share on Discord.

What this article covers: 

  • What are Clips?
  • How to Enable Clips
    • Overview of Clips Settings
    • Minimum System Requirements
  • How to Create Clips
  • How to Edit Clips
  • How to Share Clips
  • How to Delete Clips

What are Clips?

Do you ever find yourself streaming a game to your friends only to have an AMAZING moment that you wish you could clip to watch and share later? Now you can! While streaming, you can clip any fun or amazing moment by saving them directly to your computer. 

Edit your favorite clips and share epic moments with friends!

How to Enable Clips

Some users may already have Clips enabled by default if their system has high end hardware. 

Having Clips enabled may impact your game performance if you have lower end hardware. If you experience any issues with your game, please try disabling Clips.

Before being able to create Clips, the feature first needs to be enabled. 

1. To enable, tap on User Settings then head to Clips.

2. Under Clips you should see an option that says Enable Clips. 

3. Toggle Enable Clips. Now you can create Clips while streaming!

Overview of Clips Settings

There are a couple of different settings for Clips, so let’s go over each one and what they do.

Enable Clips 

In order to use Clips, you first need to enable it! If a “check mark” is displayed, it’s enabled! If an “x” is there, then it’s disabled. You can learn more about enabling clips here. 

Clipping Keybind

The default keybinding for Clips is ALT+C and you can change the keybinding at any time by tapping on the keyboard icon next to the current keybinding. 

Clip Length

You can change the length of your clips to fit your needs. You can record 30 seconds, 60 seconds, or 2 minute long clips.

Hardware Encoding

If you would like to compress the videos of your clips, you can enable Hardware Encoding. 

Storage Location

When you clip an epic moment, it’s saved directly on your computer! You can change the storage location at any time by tapping on the current location and selecting a new storage option.

Minimum System Requirements

Minimum system requirements for Clips on a Windows machine is either Nvidia GTX 980s/1600s, all Nvidia RTX models, or AMD Radeon RX 500. For Mac machines, a MacBook 2017 or later.

Users may have Clips enabled by default if their system has either an Nvidia RTX 2000 series or greater, or a Radeon RX5700 series or greater.

How to Create Clips

When streaming, make sure you’re streaming through Application and not just your screen. This ensures that game audio is also captured.

There are two ways to create Clips while you’re streaming.

First, while streaming a game you can press on the keybinding that you set to clip (default is ALT+C). If you have Game Overlay turned on, you’ll even see a pop-up that shows a clip was created and you’ll hear a sound to confirm a clip has been created.

Second, you can tap on the Save Clip icon that is located next to the game title that you’re streaming.

If you want to clip a part of your stream, you must make sure to press the Clip keybind or the Save Clip icon immediately after the moment you want to clip. This will automatically save the most recent portion of your stream based on the Clip Length setting you have enabled.

How to Edit Clips

1. Tap the [+] icon to the left of the text box in a text channel of your choice.

2. Then, tap on Share a Clip.

3. Here, you’ll see all of the clips that you have taken. Each game title will be listed along with the clip title. To edit a clip, hover over the clip you want and tap on the Edit icon.

4. Here, you can hold and drag on the timeline located below to get exactly the moment you want to share. You can also enable or disable Game Audio and Voice Channel Audio. 

5. To change the title, tap where the current title is and add in the new title!

6. Finally, select the check mark to save it to your computer or you can tap out of the Clips screen and it’ll automatically save any changes you made to that clip.

How to Share Clips

In the same place where you edited your Clip is where you can find the option to share the Clip to your friends!

1. Tap the [+] icon to the left of the text box in the text channel you’re wanting to share the clip at.

2. Then, tap on Share a Clip.

3. Here, you’ll see all of the clips that you have taken. Each game title will be listed along with the clip title. To share a clip, you can either hover over the clip and tap on Share or tap on Edit to edit the clip before sharing.

4. If you decide to tap on Share to share the clip without editing, then the clip will appear in your text box.

5. If you decide to edit the clip before sharing, you can make final edits in this window instead. Check out the steps in How to Edit Clips for more instructions on editing your saved clip.

6. Finally, select the check mark to save the changes or select Share Clip to send the clip.

How to Delete Clips

Once a clip has been fully deleted, it cannot be restored. Make sure you’re deleting the correct clip.

Sometimes you have a clip you don’t want to keep because you clipped it on accident, or for any other reason. Here is how to delete a clip:

1. Tap the [+] icon to the left of the text box. 

2. Then, tap on Share a Clip.

3. Here you’ll see all of the clips that you have taken. To delete one, tap on the trashcan icon or open up the clip and tap on the trashcan icon there.

4. Then, you’ll see a prompt asking if you’re sure and want to delete the clip.

5. After tapping on Delete Clip, the clip will be removed from both Clips and your computer. If you decide you don’t want to delete the clip, tap on the x to close it out.

And that’s it! Now go share some funny and epic gaming moments with your friend.

If you have any issues or questions about Clips, please reach out to our Support team for further assistance: https://dis.gd/contact.

name: Packs FAQ
title: Packs FAQ
body:
Have you ever wondered how to get that same awesome cat emoji your friend posted five seconds ago? With packs, you can press any emoji and add all the cat emojis within the pack to your emoji picker! 

What this article covers: 

  • What are Packs? 
  • How to Add a Pack   
  • How to Manage your Server’s Pack 
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What are Packs? 

A pack is a set of emojis that can be shared across Discord. Packs are automatically created for each server, and will contain that server’s set of custom emojis. 

Unless a server makes their pack private, non-server members will now be able to join in on the fun and access their emoji content! To learn how to add emoji to your server, you can find out more here.  

This feature is currently in beta and only available on Desktop to a limited number of communities!  

How to Add a Pack

There are many emojis to choose from as you venture into Discord!

1. To get started, select any emoji within a posted message. 

2. Once you press on an emoji, you will be able to see a preview showing other emojis and the server they are from. 

3. If you’d like to add the emoji pack, you can press Add Pack within the preview.   

With a Nitro or Nitro Basic subscription, you can add up to 100 packs! If you are not subscribed to Nitro or Nitro Basic, you will be able to add up to 1 pack for free. If you’d like to learn more about our subscription perks, you can find out more here.

How to Manage your Server’s Pack

Note: The pack sharing setting is enabled by default for servers. 

To manage your pack settings, you will need to be the owner of the server. 

1. To get started, head into your Server Settings by selecting the drop-down menu located next to the server name. 

2. Once redirected, press the Emoji tab. 

3. Then, toggle the Allow anyone to add and use this server’s emoji setting to enable or disable it. If enabled, this setting allows your custom emojis to become visible in previews across Discord. You can also see how many have added your server’s emojis!   

If you’d like to stop sharing your custom emojis, you can disable this setting at any time. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Who can use my pack? 

A: Anyone on Discord will be able to add your pack and use the emojis if you have chosen to enable the setting. 

Q: Are there any rules around what type of emoji can be shared in a pack?

A: All emoji added to Discord should follow our community guidelines and Terms of Service. If you see inappropriate content in emoji packs, please report the content.

name: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Genshin Impact Players - Promo FAQ
title: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Genshin Impact Players - Promo FAQ
body:
This promotion is gradually rolling out to all eligible regions!

Starting from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), Genshin Impact players can claim 1 month of free Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of free Discord Nitro for Genshin Impact players. 

Who is Eligible: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

We will not be able to refund any leftover subscription time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing sub when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through the collaboration event hosted by HoYoLAB and redeem from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST). 

Subscription: After the 1 month free trial period, your Nitro subscription will convert to a monthly recurring subscription, and Discord will bill your payment method until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

Please note: This Nitro promotion is not available in Mainland China, Iran, Ukraine, and Russia. 

What this article covers: 

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Genshin Impact?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from Genshin Impact?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • How do I share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Genshin Impact?

Genshin Impact is an open-world action RPG, where players embark on a journey across a magical world called Teyvat in search of their long-lost sibling. As you unravel the mysteries of Teyvat, you will encounter dangerous monsters you and your friends can defeat together! 

This fantasy adventure is from developer and publisher HoYoverse! You can read more about this promotion here.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Genshin Impact account?

You can claim this promotion on browser! 

Note: Only Genshin Impact players who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or higher in Fontaine on their HoYoverse Account, will be able to claim this promotion!

How to claim the Nitro Promo through browser: 

1. If you meet the eligibility requirements, leave a comment on the HoYoLAB post during the promotion period and your participation will have been deemed successful.

2. Event participants will receive the link for a 1-month Discord Nitro trial via HoYoLAB messages from the official Genshin Impact team within 72 hours of commenting. 

3. Once you have received the message, select the link to collect the event reward.

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo link, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo link on your Discord account (or share this code with a friend). You must redeem this Nitro trial by August 15th, 2023 to September 26th, 2023. 

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro subscription, redeeming this promotion will override that subscription.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro subscription on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo link on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo link.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copy and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing or right-click on the promotion link and copy and paste the link into your browser window.

Note: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 

Note:
- If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:
- By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Genshin Impact players can claim Discord Nitro promo between August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

After September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), Genshin Impact players will no longer be able to claim a trial promo link.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion link last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from their Genshin Impact email?

A: This promotion is available in all regions except for the following: Mainland China, Iran, Russia, and Ukraine. Genshin Impact players in eligible regions, who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or higher on their HoYoverse Account, will be able to claim this promotion.

To redeem this your in-game content: 

1. Visit the official Genshin Impact website's code redemption page.

2.  Log in to your game account and enter the redemption code as prompted.

3. You'll receive the bundle via your in-game mail.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro subscription on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro subscription and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost subscriber? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro subscription at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic subscription in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscription active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro subscription,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro subscription.

HOWEVER, please note:
- By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current subscriptions, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current subscription**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro subscription per month unless you cancel your subscription.

Payment Info and Subscription Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a subscription plan, at the end of your free 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro subscription at any time before the end of the 1 month trial.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I didn't receive an email from Genshin Impact with the Nitro promo link, even if I'm a Genshin Impact player?

A: In order to receive an email from Genshin Impact with the Nitro promo link, you must be a Genshin Impact player.

Additionally, make sure that you've opted to receive marketing emails from Genshin Impact. If you've unsubscribed, you sadly won't be able to see this offer. 

If you believe you are eligible for the promotion, contact Genshin Impact's support team: 

  • ZH region: genshin_cs@nijigengames.com
  • JP region: genshin_jp@hoyoverse.com
  • DE, EN, ES, FR, ID, IT, KR, PT, RU, HT, TR, and VN regions：genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com 

Q: I see a Sad Trombone error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: Would you happen to be entering this Nitro promo link from the promotion into the Discord Gift Inventory or as a link within Discord chat?

If so, this is the incorrect method for redeeming the Nitro promo link, and you will see an error when attempting to redeem the promotion.

In order to successfully claim this promotion, try opening up an incognito browser and then copy and pasting the promotion link into your browser's address bar (also known as a location bar or URL bar). 

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro subscription so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on. Or you can give the promotion link to a friend who hasn't had Nitro before.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk. However, this promo link can be gifted to a friend.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been redeemed" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been redeemed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo link has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've redeemed this promo link on another Discord account.

In particular, if you redeemed this promo link using your mobile device, double check the browser on your mobile device and see which Discord account you are currently logged into.

Unfortunately, once the promo link has been redeemed, the promo link cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the link is invalid. If you've copy and pasted this link, we recommend you double check the link you were given once more and make sure it exactly matches the link sent to your email.

If you received this link from a friend, double check with your friend on the exact link to make sure that it matches the link in their email.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if your friend has given an invalid link and we will not be able to provide a new link.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo link!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I’m having trouble with my Genshin Impact account.

A: If you are having issues redeeming this promotion on your Genshin Impact account, you can reach out to your region’s Genshin Impact support team at: 

  • ZH region: genshin_cs@nijigengames.com
  • JP region: genshin_jp@hoyoverse.com
  • DE, EN, ES, FR, ID, IT, KR, PT, RU, HT, TR, and VN regions：genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com

name: Genshin Impact Gift Pack for Discord Nitro Users - Promo FAQ
title: Genshin Impact Gift Pack for Discord Nitro Users - Promo FAQ
body:
This promotion is gradually rolling out to all eligible regions!

Starting from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), Discord Nitro subscribers can redeem an exclusive in-game gift pack for the action-based RPG, Genshin Impact.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: Genshin Impact in-game gift pack for Discord Nitro subscribers

Included in the gift pack are the following items: 

  1. Primogems x60
  2. Hero’s Wit x10
  3. Mora x100,000
  4. Eminent Share Bundle x5
  5. Adventurer’s Breakfast Sandwich x5

Who is Eligible: 

  • To claim through Discord, you must be a current Nitro subscriber or Nitro trial subscriber. 
  • To redeem in Genshin Impact, you must have an active Genshin Impact account. 
    • This promotion is available in all regions except for the following: Mainland China, Iran, Russia, and Ukraine. Genshin Impact players, who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or higher in Fontaine on their HoYoverse Account, can redeem this gift the following in eligible servers: America, Europe, Asia, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macao. 

Requirements:

Claim through the Discord Gift Inventory from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), and redeem the gift pack in your Genshin Impact account.

Please note: This Nitro promotion is not available in Mainland China, Iran, Ukraine, and Russia. 

What this article covers: 

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Genshin Impact? 
  • How do I claim the Genshin Impact Promo in Discord? 
    • Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions 
  • How do I redeem the gift pack in my Genshin Impact Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Gift Pack
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions
  • How do I share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Claiming and Redemption Process
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Genshin Impact?

Genshin Impact  is an open-world action RPG, where players embark on a journey across a magical world called Teyvat in search of their long-lost sibling. As you unravel the mysteries of Teyvat, you will encounter dangerous monsters you and your friends can defeat together!  

This fantasy adventure is from developer and publisher HoYoverse! You can read more about this promotion here. 

How do I claim the Genshin Impact Promo in Discord?

As long as you're a Discord Nitro member, you'll be able to claim the Genshin Impact Gift Pack code in the Gift Inventory from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PST) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

Redemption of this promotion is in limited supply and subject to availability.

Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord

In order to claim this code, you’ll need to be an active subscriber to Discord Nitro (and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro subscriber).

  • If you are an active Discord Nitro subscriber, the code must be claimed in the Gift Inventory by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).
    • Otherwise, the code will not be available to claim after September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST). 

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscriber, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

Nitro trial users are also able to claim the Genshin Impact Gift Pack!

Step By Step Claim Instructions 

1) Log into Your Discord account and head to the Gift Inventory tab. 

If you’re subscribed to Discord Nitro, start by logging into your Discord account. 

You may notice a notification bar at the top of your browser/desktop app, and you can press the "Take me there" button in the notification bar to be redirected to your Gift Inventory. 

You can also directly head to your User Settings, and then select the Gift Inventory tab.

2) Select the Claim button for the Genshin Impact Gift

Once you press Claim on the Genshin Impact Gift in the Gift Inventory and you'll then see a new pop-up with your 12 character code for this promotion.

If you want to redeem your code later, you can press the Maybe Later button, and then redeem the code before September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

How do I redeem the gift pack in my Genshin Impact Account?

Once you have claimed the code in the Gift Inventory, you'll now need to officially redeem this code on your Genshin Impact account (or share this code with a friend).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Gift Pack

Note: Only Genshin Impact players who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or higher in Fontaine on their HoYoverse Account, will be able to claim this in-game gift pack!

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

Note: Make sure you are logged into the correct Genshin Impact account before officially redeeming this gift pack. Once redeemed, the gift pack cannot be transferred to another account.

In order to redeem the gift pack on your Genshin Impact account, you will need to head over to the Genshin Impact’s official website or launch the Genshin Impact app. 

How to Redeem the Gift Pack through the website: 

  1. First, head over to the Genshin Impact official website’s code redemption page.
  2. Then, log into your game account. 

  1. Once you’ve logged in, follow the Redeem Code instructions presented on the screen and enter the redemption code. 
  2. After redeeming a code, you will receive all of the items through your in-game mail. 

Note: It may take up to 72 hours for your in-game mail to reflect the redeemed items. If you're running into any issues when attempting to redeem this promotion, and you believe that your Genshin Impact account meets the promotion requirements, you can find out how to contact the Genshin Impact support team in this FAQ section.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to claim this code on your own Genshin Impact account, you'll be able to share this code with a friend to use instead.

To share the code, you will need to send over the redemption link that you received after following the steps to claim the promotion! 

Note: If your friend has already redeemed a gift pack on their Genshin Impact account, they will not be able to redeem another free gift pack. 

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Claiming and Redemption Process
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion for Nitro Subscribers run for?

A: This promotion runs from August 15th, 2023 (7:00pm PDT) to September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

After September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), Nitro subscribers will no longer be able to claim a gift pack code.

Q: How long does my Genshin Impact gift code last for in my Gift Inventory?

A: Once a code is claimed in the Gift Inventory in Discord, all Genshin Impact codes must be redeemed by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Genshin Impact account by September 26th, 2023 (11:59pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to claim the gift pack.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion in the Discord Gift Inventory?

A: All current and new Nitro subscribers are eligible for this perk. 

This does not include Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boost-only members.

Q: Who can redeem this Genshin Impact gift pack to their Genshin Impact account?

A: This offer is only for users with an active Genshin Impact account.

Q: Can I redeem the gift pack promotion to my Genshin Impact account in my region? 

A: This promotion is available in all regions except for the following: Mainland China, Iran, Russia, and Ukraine. Genshin Impact players, who have reached Adventure Rank 10 or higher in Fontaine on their HoYoverse Account, can redeem this gift the following in eligible servers: America, Europe, Asia, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macao. 

If you are in an eligible region and cannot redeem this gift, please reach out to your region’s support team for Genshin Impact:

  • ZH region: genshin_cs@nijigengames.com
  • JP region: genshin_jp@hoyoverse.com
  • DE, EN, ES, FR, ID, IT, KR, PT, RU, HT, TR, and VN regions：genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com 

Claiming and Redemption Process

Q: On which Discord platforms can I claim this promotion?

A: You'll be able to redeem the promo on the Android, browser, and desktop version of the Discord app. You will be unable to redeem this promotion on the Discord iOS app.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I don't see the Genshin Impact gift pack code in my Discord Gift Inventory? 

A: In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active subscriber to Discord Nitro and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro subscriber.

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting subscriber, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

If you are an active Discord Nitro subscriber, make sure to refresh your Discord client to double check if an update was needed.

  • What if I'm still running into issues? 
    • If the refresh does not work, please submit a ticket through our support system at: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.
    • Be sure to submit the ticket using the email address associated with your Discord account, and send us a screenshot of the following: 
      1. Your My Account tab
      2. Your Gift Inventory tab

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this promotion to my Genshin Impact account. How do I contact Genshin Impact support? 

A: If you are having issues redeeming this promotion on your Genshin Impact account, you can reach out to your region’s Genshin Impact support team at: 

  • ZH region: genshin_cs@nijigengames.com
  • JP region: genshin_jp@hoyoverse.com

DE, EN, ES, FR, ID, IT, KR, PT, RU, HT, TR, and VN regions：genshin_cs@hoyoverse.com

name: Master Sweepstakes Rules
title: Master Sweepstakes Rules
body:
Discord Master Giveaway Terms

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR TO WIN. A PURCHASE OR PAYMENT WILL NOT IMPROVE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING.

VOID WHERE PROHIBITED. UNLESS YOU ARE A RESIDENT OF FRANCE, GERMANY, GREAT BRITAIN, OR OTHER COUNTRY WHERE A CLASS ACTION WAIVER IS NOT ENFORCEABLE, THESE DISCORD SWEEPSTAKES TERMS CONTAIN A CLASS ACTION WAIVER.

PLEASE SEE OUR PRIVACY NOTICE BELOW.

By entering any applicable Discord giveaway (each, a “Sweepstakes”), you will be bound by these terms and you acknowledge and agree that you meet all eligibility requirements. “Discord” means Discord Inc. and its affiliates. Prizes, entry dates, and selection details are further described on the webpage or other point of entry where you entered that Sweepstakes and/or the Discord Help Center article describing that Sweepstakes (each, a “Sweepstakes Entry Page”).

If a Discord giveaway links to other rules than these, those rules will apply for that Discord giveaway.
